div.p: Subdistrict of Tullnerbach, lying c. 12 miles (20 km) west of Vienna, in the area of the Vienna Woods, and just north of Pressbaum. It lies on the railway to St. Pölten and Linz.

div.head: Lawies and Schenker
div.p: Lawies was a favourite place for Schenker to visit in the 1900s, and later with Jeanette in the 1920s. The flavor of such a visit is vividly conveyed in a diary entry for April 26, 1924: 1:30 to Tullnerbach – Pressbaum – Lawies; we have coffee there and walk to the forest. Resounding with cuckoo's cries. Lie-Liechen picks cowslips and primroses on a wet meadow. We stop off once again at the restaurant, only to drink a glass of soda water; I give the landlord a 500 Kronen tip – then ask for another cigar and, in spite of the tip just received, the landlord is not ashamed to demand an excess price for the cigar too! Back at 4:30. But we are not due to leave Hütteldorf until 6:15!
